price: Isaaniifi abbootii isaaniitiifis isa irratti beekumsi hin jiru. Jechi afaan isaanii irraa baatu waa guddatte! Soba malee homaa hin haasa’anu.
arabic: مَّا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا لِأٓبَآئِهِمۡۚ كَبُرَتۡ كَلِمَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡۚ إِن يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبٗا
footnotes: [1] Wanti aayanni kun itti fedhe yeroo Rabbiin ilmoo qaba jedhanu beekumsas ta’ee ragaa homaatuu hin qabanu; yaaduma isaaniitiin dubbatan jechuudha.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā lahum bihi min ʿil'min walā liābāihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwāhihim in yaqūlūna illā kadhiban
